summary_of_video:
- A person enters the store carrying a handbag and proceeds toward the checkout area.
- The individual interacts with items near the counter while holding a white bag.
- The person appears to place items into the white bag without visibly paying.
- The individual exits the store without approaching the cashier or completing a transaction.
key_behaviors:
- Concealing items into a white bag without visible payment.
- Avoiding checkout or cashier interaction.
- Exiting the store without completing a transaction.
